        @PostMapping(value="/api/makeModerator")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity grantModerator(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                        int userId,
                                                                                                        int groupId)
        Make a user a moderator of a group.
        Parameters:
        session - session
        userId - user id to grant privileges to
        groupId - group id group to grant privileges in
        Returns:
        200 OK if authorized, 403 forbidden otherwise
